name: They Will Grow!
description:
Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Melee Attack: Spacebar
  • Shooting: Arrow Keys
Summary

Enemy slimes have it out for you! If they touch each other, they will grow stronger!
Slice them with your sword to separate them.

 As slimes merge together, they become incredibly strong together

Post-Jam

Issues or features we think would be nice to have, but didn't have the time to implement

Known Issues
  • On a Game Over, the number of enemies being spawned in a level isn't reset
  • The Projectile Damage upgrade doesn't seem to take affect
  • Sometimes the level will complete too early
Feature Wishlist
  • Music
  • More Sound FX
  • ProcGen levels (or hand made levels instead)
  • Might look into removing Player shooting entirely to focus on the melee combat
